results.abstract: The director of the provocative horror film “Possessor Uncut” argues that none of us are ever truly ourselves: “There’s an internal performance that we all engage with.”
Is there something sinister about the well-heeled suitor of a faraway daughter in New Orleans?

The Haunting of Bly Manor (TV Program)
results.title: ‘The Haunting of Bly Manor’ Brings Back the Ghosts of Henry James
results.abstract: James’s 1898 novella “The Turn of the Screw” has been adapted in many forms, the latest being a new Netflix series. Here’s a look at the story’s history onscreen.

multimedia.caption: The Netflix series “The Haunting of Bly Manor” is the latest of many screen adaptations of “The Turn of the Screw.” Pictured, from left: Benjamin Evan Ainsworth, Victoria Pedretti, Rahul Kohli, Amelia Eve and Amelie Smith (backround).

The Netflix series “The Haunting of Bly Manor” is the latest of many screen adaptations of “The Turn of the Screw.” Pictured, from left: Benjamin Evan Ainsworth, Victoria Pedretti, Rahul Kohli, Amelia Eve and Amelie Smith (backround).

The Netflix series “The Haunting of Bly Manor” is the latest of many screen adaptations of “The Turn of the Screw.” Pictured, from left: Benjamin Evan Ainsworth, Victoria Pedretti, Rahul Kohli, Amelia Eve and Amelie Smith (backround).

The Netflix series “The Haunting of Bly Manor” is the latest of many screen adaptations of “The Turn of the Screw.” Pictured, from left: Benjamin Evan Ainsworth, Victoria Pedretti, Rahul Kohli, Amelia Eve and Amelie Smith (backround).

The Netflix series “The Haunting of Bly Manor” is the latest of many screen adaptations of “The Turn of the Screw.” Pictured, from left: Benjamin Evan Ainsworth, Victoria Pedretti, Rahul Kohli, Amelia Eve and Amelie Smith (backround).

results.title: Need an Essential Chronicler of America? Try This Nonfiction Master
results.abstract: Frederick Wiseman captures life unfolding within institutions. If that sounds boring, the riveting “Public Housing” shows why his work is anything but.
